subject: Football
College Athletics
Cheating
lead_paragraph: Cam Newton’s academic problems contrast with the story that he and his father have perpetuated as he has evolved from an unknown transfer to the front-runner for the Heisman Trophy.
snippet: Cam Newton’s academic problems contrast with the story that he and his father have perpetuated as he has evolved from an unknown transfer to the front-runner for the Heisman Trophy.
